toy story.background_setting: Andy’s upstairs hallway and wooded stairs
toy story.background_activity: toy land citizens are scurrying about in the hallway attending to their daily activities, from getting their haircut to getting a piece replaced at the maintenance center
toy story.location_description: The hallway is definitely a nice part of town for the town.
toy story.secondary_action_description: crouched on the ground, carefully cleaning his boots with exaggerated focus
toy story.dialogue_line: Okay, so we’re late to Bo’s Family Dinner, traffic is jammed, and Woody needed to get out and clean his leather.

barbie.face_visibility: her perfectly styled face framed with blonde curls
barbie.background_activity: other Barbies doing yoga, styling outfits, or roller skating around
barbie.location_description: It’s a glamorous day in Barbie's world.
barbie.secondary_action_description: checking his reflection while adjusting a sequined jacket
barbie.dialogue_line: We're already late for the Dream Gala and Ken’s still fussing over his hair!

star wars.face_visibility: his sunburned face visible beneath a hood
star wars.outfit_material: rough-spun tunic with a worn leather belt
star wars.background_setting: a hangar with droids moving crates
star wars.background_activity: droids repairing ships and rebels preparing for battle
star wars.location_description: This outpost is barely holding together.
star wars.secondary_action_description: whirring softly while welding a circuit panel
star wars.dialogue_line: We’re out of time. R2 blew the hyperdrive coil again.
